feed.title: S&P 500 Edges Higher as Tech Rally Continues
feed.summary: The S&P 500 rose 0.4% as technology stocks continued their upward momentum, led by gains in semiconductor and cloud computing companies.

feed.title: Federal Reserve Signals Patience on Rate Cuts
feed.summary: Federal Reserve officials indicated they are in no rush to cut interest rates, citing persistent inflation concerns and a resilient labor market.

feed.title: Apple Reports Record Services Revenue in Q1
feed.summary: Apple Inc. reported record services revenue of $23.1 billion in Q1 2025, driven by strong growth in App Store, Apple Music, and iCloud subscriptions.

feed.title: Tesla Announces New Battery Technology Partnership
feed.summary: Tesla signed a strategic partnership with a leading battery manufacturer to develop next-generation solid-state batteries for its EV lineup.

feed.title: Energy Sector Under Pressure Amid Oil Price Decline
feed.summary: Energy stocks fell broadly as crude oil prices dropped 3% on concerns about weakening global demand and rising OPEC+ production.
